# Quantitative Genetics

\[
\sigma_P^2 = \sigma_G^2 + \sigma_E^2 + \sigma_{GxE}^2 
\]

\[
\sigma_G^2 =\sigma_A^2 + \sigma_D^2 + \sigma_I^2 
\]






## Heritability

\[
H^2 = \frac{\sigma_G^2}{\sigma_P^2}
\]


\[
h^2 = \frac{\sigma_A^2}{\sigma_P^2}
\]


## Data Examples

![Dogwood seedlings growing in the greenhouse.  Seeds were collected from urban and natural populations and grown in either full light (to mimic urban environments) and shaded (to mimic native popualtions)](./media/seedlings.png)





```{r}
load("media/seedlings.rda")
summary(seedlings)
```





```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(GGally)
library(ggplot2)
ggpairs( seedlings, columns=4:8)
```

### Measured Traits

```{r}
ggplot(seedlings) + geom_density( aes(fill=Source,x=Cold), alpha=0.75) + facet_grid(Treatment~.)
```
